News.headline: Football Manager 2017 Now Only £25.00
News.short_description: We are now stocking Football Manager 2017 which is available to buy online and in our club shop.
News.description:
Football Manager 2017 is now available to buy online or in the club shop.

The Club shop will be selling the game for a reduced price of £25.00 which is a discount from the recommended retail price of £34.99, and you can take advantage of our free postage on our online shop up until the 30th November. 

Click here to go to the online shop.
